verses.verse: <S%G816><s%> And Having Looked Intently <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> On The <S%G3588><s%> Sanhedrim <S%G4892><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> I 1473 P-1NS In All 3956 A-DSF Conscience 4893 N-DSF Good 18 A-DSF Have Conducted Myself 4176 V-RPI-1S Towards 3588 T-DSM God 2316 N-DSM Unto 891 PREP This 3778 D-GSF 3588 T-GSF Day. 2250 N-GSF

But <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G1161><s%> High Priest <S%G749><s%> Ananias <S%G367><s%> Ordered <S%G2004><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Standing By <S%G3936><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To Smite <S%G5180><s%> His <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Mouth. <S%G4750><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> To Smite <S%G5180><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> Is About <S%G3195><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> Wall <S%G5109><s%> Whited. <S%G2867><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Does Thou Sit <S%G2521><s%> Judging <S%G2919><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Law, <S%G3551><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Contrary To Law <S%G3891><s%> Commandest <S%G2753><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> To Be Smitten? <S%G5180><s%>
And <S%G3588><s%> Those Who <S%G1161><s%> Stood By <S%G3936><s%>, Said, <S%G2036><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> High Priest <S%G749><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Railest Thou At? <S%G3058><s%>

And <S%G5346><s%> Said <S%G5037><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> I Was Not <S%G3756><s%> Conscious, <S%G1492><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> He Is <S%G2076><s%> A High Priest; <S%G749><s%> It Has Been Written, <S%G1125><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> A Ruler <S%G758><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2992><s%> Thy People <S%G4675><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Thou Shalt Speak <S%G2046><s%> Of Evil. <S%G2560><s%>

<S%G1097><s%> But Having Known <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Part <S%G3313><s%> Consists <S%G2076><s%> Of Sadducees <S%G4523><s%> And <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G1161><s%> Other <S%G2087><s%> Of Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> Cried Out <S%G2896><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sanhedrim, <S%G4892><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> I 1473 P-1NS A Pharisee 5330 N-NSM Am, 1510 V-PXI-1S Son 5207 N-NSM Of A Pharisee : 5330 N-GSM Concerning 4012 PREP A Hope 1680 N-GSF And 2532 CONJ Resurrection 386 N-GSF Of The Dead 3498 A-GPM I 1473 P-1NS Am Judged. 2919 V-PPI-1S

And <S%G5124><s%> This <S%G1161><s%> He <S%G846><s%>, Having Spoken <S%G2980><s%> There Was <S%G1096><s%> A Dissension <S%G4714><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sadducees, <S%G4523><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Divided <S%G4977><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Multitude. <S%G4128><s%>

Sadducees <S%G4523><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Say <S%G3004><s%> There <S%G3361><s%> Is No <S%G1511><s%> Resurrection <S%G386><s%> Nor <S%G3366><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Nor <S%G3383><s%> Spirit; <S%G4151><s%> <S%G5330><s%> But Pharisees <S%G1161><s%> Confess <S%G3670><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Both. <S%G297><s%>

<S%G1096><s%> And There Was <S%G1161><s%> A Clamour <S%G2906><s%> Great, <S%G3173><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Risen Up <S%G450><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Part <S%G3313><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> They Were Contending, <S%G1264><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Nothing <S%G3762><s%> Evil <S%G2556><s%> We Find <S%G2147><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> This <S%G444><s%> Man; <S%G5129><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> A Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Spoke <S%G2980><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> An Angel, <S%G32><s%> Let Us <S%G3361><s%> Not Fight Against God. <S%G2313><s%>

<S%G4183><s%> And A Great <S%G1161><s%> Arising <S%G1096><s%> Dissention, <S%G4714><s%> Fearing <S%G2125><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Captain <S%G5506><s%> Lest <S%G3361><s%> Should Be Torn In Pieces <S%G1288><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> ' By <S%G5259><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Commanded <S%G2753><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Troop <S%G4753><s%> Having Gone Down <S%G2597><s%> To Take By Force <S%G726><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> Midst <S%G3319><s%> Their, <S%G846><s%> <S%G71><s%> And To Bring Him <S%G5037><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fortress. <S%G3925><s%>

But <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G1161><s%> Following <S%G1966><s%> Night <S%G3571><s%> Standing By <S%G2186><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Be Of Good Courage, <S%G2293><s%> Paul; <S%G3972><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Thou Didst Fully Testify <S%G1263><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Me <S%G1700><s%> At <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> So <S%G3779><s%> Thou <S%G4571><s%> Must <S%G1163><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> At <S%G1519><s%> Rome <S%G4516><s%> Bear Witness. <S%G3140><s%>

<S%G1096><s%> And It Being <S%G1161><s%> Day, <S%G2250><s%> Having Made <S%G4160><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> A Combination <S%G4963><s%> Put Under A Curse <S%G332><s%> Themselves, <S%G1438><s%> Declaring <S%G3004><s%> Neither <S%G3383><s%> To Eat <S%G5315><s%> Nor <S%G3383><s%> To Drink <S%G4095><s%> <S%G2193><s%> Till <S%G3739><s%> They Should Kill <S%G615><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul. <S%G3972><s%>
<S%G2258><s%> And They Were <S%G1161><s%> More Than <S%G4119><s%> Forty <S%G5062><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Conspiracy <S%G4945><s%>, Had Made; <S%G4160><s%>

Who <S%G3748><s%> Having Come <S%G4334><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Priests <S%G749><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Elders <S%G4245><s%>, Said, <S%G2036><s%> With A Curse <S%G331><s%> Who Have Cursed <S%G332><s%> Ourselves, <S%G1438><s%> Nothing <S%G3367><s%> To Taste <S%G1089><s%> <S%G2193><s%> Until <S%G3739><s%> We Should Kill <S%G615><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul. <S%G3972><s%>

Now <S%G3568><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Make A Representation <S%G1718><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Captain <S%G5506><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sanhedrim, <S%G4892><s%> So That <S%G3704><s%> Tomorrow <S%G839><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> He May Bring Down <S%G2609><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Being About <S%G3195><s%> To Examine <S%G1231><s%> More Accurately <S%G199><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2249><s%> We, <S%G1161><s%> Before <S%G4253><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Drawing Near <S%G1448><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Ready <S%G2092><s%> Are <S%G2070><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Put To Death <S%G337><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G191><s%> But Having Heard Of <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Sister <S%G79><s%> Of Paul <S%G3972><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lying In Wait, <S%G1749><s%> Having Come Near <S%G3854><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Entered <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fortress <S%G3925><s%> He Reported It <S%G518><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Paul. <S%G3972><s%>

<S%G4341><s%> And Having Called To Him <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Centurions, <S%G1543><s%> Said, <S%G5346><s%> This <S%G3588><s%> Young <S%G3494><s%> Man <S%G5126><s%> Take <S%G520><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Captain, <S%G5506><s%> He Has <S%G2192><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Something <S%G5100><s%> To Report <S%G518><s%> To Him. <S%G846><s%>

He <S%G3588><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Having Taken <S%G3880><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Brought Him <S%G71><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Captain, <S%G5506><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Says, <S%G5346><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prisoner <S%G1198><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> Having Called To Him <S%G4341><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Asked Me <S%G2065><s%> This <S%G5126><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Young Man <S%G3494><s%> To Lead <S%G71><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Thee, <S%G4571><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> Something <S%G5100><s%> To Say <S%G2980><s%> To Thee. <S%G4671><s%>

<S%G1949><s%> And Having Taken Hold <S%G1161><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Hand <S%G5495><s%> His <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Captain, <S%G5506><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Withdrawn <S%G402><s%> ' <S%G2596><s%> Apart <S%G2398><s%> Inquired, <S%G4441><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> It Is <S%G2076><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Thou Hast <S%G2192><s%> To Report <S%G518><s%> To Me? <S%G3427><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> <S%G1161><s%> And He Said, <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> Agreed <S%G4934><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Request <S%G2065><s%> Thee, <S%G4571><s%> That <S%G3704><s%> Tomorrow <S%G839><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sanhedrim <S%G4892><s%> Thou Mayest Bring Down <S%G2609><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul, <S%G3972><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Being About <S%G3195><s%> Something <S%G5100><s%> More Accurately <S%G199><s%> To Inquire <S%G4441><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

Thou <S%G4771><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Be Not <S%G3361><s%> Persuaded <S%G3982><s%> By Them, <S%G846><s%> Lie In Wait For <S%G1748><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> More Than <S%G4119><s%> Forty <S%G5062><s%> Who <S%G3748><s%> Put Under A Curse <S%G332><s%> Themselves <S%G1438><s%> Neither <S%G3383><s%> To Eat <S%G5315><s%> Nor <S%G3383><s%> To Drink <S%G4095><s%> <S%G2193><s%> Till <S%G3739><s%> They Put To Death <S%G337><s%> Him; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> Ready <S%G2092><s%> They Are <S%G1526><s%> Waiting <S%G4327><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Thee <S%G4675><s%> Promise. <S%G1860><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> The <S%G3303><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Chief Captain <S%G5506><s%> Dismissed <S%G630><s%> The <S%G3588><s%>, Young Man, <S%G3494><s%> Having Charged Him <S%G3853><s%> To No One <S%G3367><s%> To Utter <S%G1583><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Thou Didst Represent <S%G1718><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Me. <S%G3165><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Called To Him <S%G4341><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Centurions <S%G1543><s%> He Said, <S%G2036><s%> Prepare <S%G2090><s%> Soldiers <S%G4757><s%> Two Hundred, <S%G1250><s%> That <S%G3704><s%> They May Go <S%G4198><s%> As Far As <S%G2193><s%> Caesarea, <S%G2542><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Horsemen <S%G2460><s%> Seventy, <S%G1440><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Spearmen <S%G1187><s%> Two Hundred, <S%G1250><s%> For <S%G575><s%> The Third <S%G5154><s%> Hour <S%G5610><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Night. <S%G3571><s%>

<S%G2934><s%> And Beasts <S%G5037><s%> To Have Provided, <S%G3936><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Having Set On <S%G1913><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> They May Carry Him Safe Through <S%G1295><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Felix <S%G5344><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Governor, <S%G2232><s%>
Having Written <S%G1125><s%> A Letter <S%G1992><s%> Having <S%G4023><s%> <S%G3588><s%> This <S%G5179><s%> Form : <S%G5126><s%>
Claudius <S%G2804><s%> Lysias <S%G3079><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Most Excellent <S%G2903><s%> Governor, <S%G2232><s%> Felix, <S%G5344><s%> Greeting. <S%G5463><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> This <S%G435><s%> Man, <S%G5126><s%> Having Been Seized <S%G4815><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Jews, <S%G2453><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Being About <S%G3195><s%> To Put To Death <S%G337><s%> ' By <S%G5259><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Having Come Up <S%G2186><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Troop <S%G4753><s%> I Rescued <S%G1807><s%>, Him, <S%G846><s%> Having Heard <S%G3129><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> A Roman <S%G4514><s%> He Is. <S%G2076><s%>

<S%G1014><s%> And Desiring <S%G1161><s%> To Know <S%G1097><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Charge <S%G156><s%> ' On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> They Accused <S%G1458><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> I Brought Down <S%G2609><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sanhedrim : <S%G4892><s%> Their <S%G846><s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> I Found <S%G2147><s%> To Be Accused <S%G1458><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Questions <S%G2213><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Law, <S%G3551><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> <S%G3367><s%> But No <S%G1161><s%> Worthy <S%G514><s%> Of Death <S%G2288><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Of Bonds <S%G1199><s%> Accusation <S%G1462><s%> Having. <S%G2192><s%>

<S%G3377><s%> And It Having Been Intimated <S%G1161><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> Of A Plot <S%G1917><s%> Against <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Man <S%G435><s%> About <S%G3195><s%> To Be Carried Out <S%G2071><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%>, Jews <S%G2453><s%> At Once <S%G1824><s%> I Said Him <S%G3992><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Thee, <S%G4571><s%> Having Charged <S%G3853><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Accusers <S%G2725><s%> To Say <S%G3004><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> Against <S%G4314><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Before <S%G1909><s%> Thee. <S%G4675><s%> Farewell. <S%G4517><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> The <S%G3303><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Soldiers, <S%G4757><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Orders Given <S%G1299><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Having Taken <S%G353><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> Brought Him <S%G71><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Night <S%G3571><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Antipatris, <S%G494><s%>

And <S%G3588><s%> On The <S%G1161><s%> Morrow <S%G1887><s%> Having Left <S%G1439><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Horsemen <S%G2460><s%> To Go <S%G4198><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> They Returned <S%G5290><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fortress. <S%G3925><s%>

Who <S%G3748><s%> Having Entered <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Caesarea, <S%G2542><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Given Up <S%G325><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Letter <S%G1992><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Governor, <S%G2232><s%> Presented <S%G3936><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> To Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G314><s%> And Having Read It <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%>, Governor, <S%G2232><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Asked <S%G1905><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> What <S%G4169><s%> Province <S%G1885><s%> He Is <S%G2076><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Learnt <S%G4441><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Cilicia He Is, <S%G2791><s%>

I Will Hear Fully <S%G1251><s%> Thee, <S%G4675><s%> He Said, <S%G5346><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Accusers <S%G2725><s%> Thine <S%G4675><s%> May Have Arrived. <S%G3854><s%> <S%G2753><s%> And He Commanded <S%G5037><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Praetorium <S%G4232><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Herod <S%G2264><s%> To Be Kept. <S%G5442><s%>
